name: VA Health Benefits
description: VA Health Benefits provide comprehensive healthcare services to eligible veterans through the Veterans Health Administration, the nation's largest integrated healthcare system.
fullDescription: VA Health Benefits provide comprehensive healthcare services to eligible veterans through the Veterans Health Administration, the nation's largest integrated healthcare system.
whatTheyOffer:
- Primary care and specialty care
- Mental health services and counseling
- Prescription medications
- Preventive care and screenings
- Women's health services
- Urgent and emergency care
- Telehealth appointments
- Prosthetics and medical equipment
howToGetIt: Apply online at VA.gov, by phone at 1-877-222-8387, or in person at any VA medical center. You'll need your DD214 or other discharge documents. Most veterans who served on active duty are eligible.
keywords: VA Health, veteran healthcare, VA hospital, mental health, prescription, telehealth, women veterans, prosthetics, DD214
